casebody.data:
No. 1270,

Misc.

Whitus et al. v. Georgia. Charles Morgan, Jr., and Melvin L. Wulf for petitioners. Arthur K. Bolton, Attorney General of Georgia, Carter A. Setliff, Assistant Attorney General, and Fred B. Hand, Solicitor General, for respondent.

Ct. App. Ga. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket and set for oral argument immediately following No. 918, Misc.
